title: Add a Video to a Product Page
description: A merchandiser wants to embed a product demonstration video from YouTube onto a product page.

tasks.description: Locate the product to be updated.
Add the YouTube video embed code to a dedicated 'video' field in the product information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully saves the embed code.

tasks.description: Verify that the video now appears and plays correctly on the live product page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the page and confirms the video is working.
